markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Other Consumables](/Rules.aspx?ID=727)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 570 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Though many consumables are grouped into specific categories, such as potions and talismans, some consumables don’t fit into those categories.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Other Consumables
